short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for easily accessing multis and subreddits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple chrome extension for accessing the list of user subscribed subreddits and user multisubreddits so you can easily access them without going into reddit and looking for them in the search bar. 

Shorcuts:
You can open the extension with Option + C on OSX, Alt+C on Linux, and Alt + Shift + C on Windows.

Issues:
There is currently an issue with the popup when you login into reddit to allow access to your account. You need to right click inside the login window and click "Inspect" so the redirect works correctly. 

The issue above should be fixed in v0.2.5, but follow the instructions if it happens since it's a problem with Reddit itself.

Features:
* Filter subreddits by writing on the search bar
* Filter subreddits with /r and subreddit name
* Filter multis with /m and multi name
* Sort subreddits by name ascending or descending
* Open subreddit on the current page with double click or Enter key
* Hold Shift, Alt or Win/Command key while opening to open the subreddit in a new tab

Icon provided by IconPacks.net (https://www.iconpacks.net/free-icon/semicolon-13254.html)
